reviewText: This show is so incredible. It supposes an idea that is original, and then explores it incredibly deeply, all its implications for society and the people in it. The first half is an incredibly rich emotional fair that actually got me to cry for a few minutes. This is the second media production of any kind that has gotten me so sad i have cried, the first being the Green Mile. It is so sad, has amazing character development, and a visual style that hasn't been successful in decades, but really shines here. I highly recommend it.
